system.descriptionText: Whilst in Cohesion, when the Player Character moves, the Comrade Duplicates the player's movement action (Move, Disengage, Run, Stand/Mount, Tactical Advance, etc). This always takes one of the Comrade's Half Actions even if the Player Character used more than a Half Action to move.
